resources.string: Swipe left to see more campaigns \nSwipe right to save a campaign \nClick a campaign for more info

The idea for village was born in a re-purposed zipper factory in Queens, New York. Our mission is to address the obscenely disparate income levels of New Yorkers by providing a fast and efficient way to give and receive acts of kindness. We aim to bring neighbors together and believe that empathy is the balm that this world needs most. Thank you for being a part of our village.
\"When we give cheerfully and accept gratefully, everyone is blessed.\" "\u2014" Maya Angelou
